descriptions: Implemented customizable HUD Editor in the Lobby menu with drag-and-drop functionality for HUD elements
Added local storage persistence ensuring user layout preferences are saved across sessions
Optimized HUD visibility logic to automatically hide progress bars when menus (Lobby/Editor) are active
Restyled UI Editor interface to match the resource's design theme, converting buttons to custom elements for consistent font rendering
Fixed NUI callback error qf:gardener:focus:on ensuring smooth transition when closing the editor
Fixed hardcoded strings in Job Lobby and Interaction prompts for full multi-language support
